sourcesContent:
import "./AddEventForm.css"; import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import countyList from "../../assets/CountyList/countyList"; import { Form, Col, Row, Button, FloatingLabel, FormControl, } from "react-bootstrap"; var today = new Date(); var dd = today.getDate(); var mm = today.getMonth()+1; //January is 0 so need to add 1 to make it 1! var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); if(dd<10){ dd='0'+dd } if(mm<10){ mm='0'+mm } today = yyyy+'-'+mm+'-'+dd; const AddEventForm = (props) => { const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const enteredSport = useRef(); const enteredLevel = useRef(); const enteredNrOfPlayers = useRef(); const enteredLvlRequirement = useRef(); const enteredCounty = useRef(); const enteredLocation = useRef(); const enteredDate = useRef(); const enteredTime = useRef(); const enteredDescription = useRef(); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); } setValidated(true); if (form.checkValidity() === true) { event.preventDefault(); const newEvent = { id: Math.random(), Sport : enteredSport.current.value, Level: enteredLevel.current.value, County : enteredCounty.current.value, NrPlayers : `1/${enteredNrOfPlayers.current.value}`, LevelRequirement : enteredLvlRequirement.current.value, Place : enteredLocation.current.value, Date : enteredDate.current.value, Time : enteredTime.current.value, Description : enteredDescription.current.value, }; props.onAddEventItem(newEvent) } }; return (

Keep in mind, once you create an event, you will not be able to edit/delete it if other users joined the event unless you make a request to all users and they agree with your request!

Choose a sport Please provide a valid sport. Choose a level Please provide a level. Nr of players including you Please provide an appropriate nr of players(including you). Level Requirement Please provide level requirement. County {countyList.map((item) => )} Please provide a valid city. You can specify a place Start date of the event Please provide start date Start time Please provide start time
); }; export default AddEventForm;
